price: حال دا چې مخکې ترې منكر شوي وو، او له لېرې ځايه به يې د غيبو ويشتل كول.
arabic: وَقَدۡ كَفَرُواْ بِهِۦ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَيَقۡذِفُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: waqad kafarū bihi min qablu wayaqdhifūna bil-ghaybi min makānin baʿīdin
